networkdesc: SDSN Antarctica is a community of universities, research centers, and other knowledge institutions to translate the latest expertise in sustainable development into action
networkVision: Mobilizing SDG implementation through solution initiatives and long-term pathways in Antarctica.

networkmetrics.desc: Awarded the Sustainability Award in Antarctica, 3 years in a row.
Scored 129 in the Antarctic region for driving SDG implementation.
Member Institutions in the South Pole - covering academia, fisheries and ice cap management firms.
